keyMappings:
unmap H
unmap L
unmap T
unmap X
unmap d
unmap o
unmap t
unmap u
unmap x

map <a-ƒ> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-i> goForward
map <c-o> goBack
map @ togglePinTab
map D closeOtherTabs
map T Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map d removeTab
map u restoreTab
map <c-]> passNextKey
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap
searchEngines:
w: http://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
on: http://eow.alc.co.jp/search?q=%s alc
en: https://translate.google.co.jp/?source=osdd#auto/en/%s google翻訳→英語
ja: https://translate.google.co.jp/?source=osdd#auto/ja/%s google翻訳→日本語
ira: https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=site:https://www.irasutoya.com%20%s&tbm=isch いらすとや
